", e->d_name, e->d_name); if (0 >= res) return MHD_CONTENT_READER_END_WITH_ERROR; if (max < (size_t) res) return MHD_CONTENT_READER_END_WITH_ERROR; return (ssize_t) res; } ``` Here are the definitions of symbols that are related to the target function dir_reader: #define MHD_CONTENT_READER_END_OF_STREAM ((ssize_t)-1) ... #define MHD_CONTENT_READER_END_WITH_ERROR ((ssize_t)-2) Please find suspicious code fragments in the code and report them.
